item.title: 크로스진 - La-Di Da-Di
item.description:
Yeah
baby girl
I don’t know
if this’s love
But I just cannot get
my eyes off of you
And just
want you to know
How I really
feel inside
Cuz you make me go
La-Di Da-Di
Check
this out

높여 봐

I like her move
and the curve
And the look
on the face
자꾸

So DJ don’t stop
spinning the music
And you don’t stop
moving your body
내게로 와

더 내게로
다가와도 물지 않아
